insert into t_article (user_id, title, `type`, like_num, collection_num, view_num, comment_num, available, create_time, update_time, content) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{likeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collectionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{viewNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{commentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{available,jdbcType=BIT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update t_article set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `type` = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, like_num = #{likeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, collection_num = #{collectionNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, view_num = #{viewNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, comment_num = #{commentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, available = #{available,jdbcType=BIT}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_id, title, `type`, like_num, collection_num, view_num, comment_num, available, create_time, update_time, content from t_article where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
